purpose: Convert visitors into registered parents/guardians by communicating trust, simplicity, and educational excellence through a modern flat design with professoral aesthetics

current_problems: Generic hero section lacks visual impact and educational identity
No hero illustration to convey the tutoring relationship
Features section uses basic icon cards without visual storytelling
How it Works section is too simplistic - doesn't show the actual platform value
No social proof or trust signals (testimonials, success metrics, professor showcase)
CTA section feels repetitive and lacks urgency or unique angle
ux_flaws: Two CTAs in hero compete for attention without clear hierarchy
Feature cards don't tell a compelling story or guide user journey
How it Works doesn't show real screenshots or concrete examples
No trust-building section before asking for signup
Missing professor preview - users can't see who they'd work with
No pricing transparency or session details
Call-to-action feels generic instead of parent-focused
ui_inconsistencies: Relies too heavily on shadcn defaults without custom visual identity
Icon-only features lack the professoral aesthetic
Color usage doesn't establish educational authority

design_strategy.visual_identity: Flat, minimalistic design with deep purple (#5B21B6 - academic purple) as primary, cream/off-white (#FFF7ED) backgrounds, and coral (#FB7185) as accent for CTAs. Illustrations should feature clean geometric shapes representing students, tutors, books, and educational elements with a warm, approachable yet professional tone.
design_strategy.layout_approach: Single-page scroll with clear visual sections separated by subtle color shifts. Hero dominates with 50/50 text-illustration split. Features use horizontal cards with inline illustrations. How it Works becomes an interactive timeline. Add social proof section with professor cards. End with trust-focused CTA.
design_strategy.component_hierarchy: Hero → Value Props → How it Works (visual timeline) → Professor Showcase → Social Proof → Final CTA with trust badges
design_strategy.illustration_strategy: 4 custom flat illustrations: (1) Hero - tutor and student with books/laptop, (2) Scheduling flow visualization, (3) Real-time feedback concept, (4) Success story visual. All use consistent geometric style with purple/coral/cream palette.
design_strategy.mobile_differences: Stack all 50/50 layouts vertically with illustration-first approach. Reduce text density. Enlarge tap targets to minimum 48px. Convert horizontal scrolls to vertical stacks. Simplify navigation to sticky header with menu icon.

illustrations.style_guide: Flat geometric design with clean shapes, no gradients, soft shadows only. Use 3-color palette: Purple (#5B21B6), Coral (#FB7185), Cream (#FFF7ED). Characters should have simple circular heads, minimal facial features (dots for eyes), and geometric bodies. Academic elements: books, laptops, calendars, charts, checkmarks, stars.

illustration_1.name: Hero Illustration
illustration_1.description: A warm, inviting scene showing a tutor (left) and student (right) sitting at a desk with an open laptop. Floating around them: book icons, checkmark badges, a calendar widget, and a small progress chart. Both characters are smiling (simple curved lines). Desk is geometric rectangle. Background has subtle floating academic elements.
illustration_1.prompt: A modern flat-style illustration showing a tutor and student at a desk with a laptop. Clean geometric shapes, simple circular heads with dot eyes and curved smile lines. Color palette: deep purple for tutor, coral pink for student, cream background. Floating elements: books, checkmarks, calendar, progress chart icons. No gradients, soft shadows, minimalist professoral academic theme. Balanced composition, friendly atmosphere.

illustration_2.name: Scheduling Flow
illustration_2.description: A simplified interface mockup showing a calendar grid with time slots being selected. A hand cursor (geometric simplified hand) pointing at a time slot. Professor avatar cards floating nearby. Checkmark appears when selection is made.
illustration_2.prompt: A modern flat-style illustration of a calendar interface with time slots. Clean geometric shapes showing calendar grid, simplified hand cursor selecting a time slot, small professor avatar cards. Color palette: purple, coral, cream. Minimalist style, no gradients, soft shadows. Academic scheduling theme with clean lines and balanced composition.

illustration_3.name: Feedback Report
illustration_3.description: A document/report icon with star ratings (5 geometric stars), progress bar showing improvement, and small icons representing different subjects (math symbols, language symbols). Checkmarks and upward trending arrow.
illustration_3.prompt: A modern flat-style illustration of a feedback report document. Clean geometric document shape with star ratings, progress bar, subject icons (math, language symbols), checkmarks, and upward trend arrow. Color palette: purple, coral, cream. Minimalist academic theme, no gradients, soft shadows, balanced composition.

illustration_4.name: Real-time Notifications
illustration_4.description: A smartphone mockup (geometric rectangle with rounded corners) displaying notification badges, check-in confirmation, and a mini progress dashboard. Bell icon with notification dot.
illustration_4.prompt: A modern flat-style illustration of a smartphone showing notification interface. Clean geometric phone shape, notification badges, bell icon, check-in confirmation checkmark, mini dashboard with progress indicators. Color palette: purple, coral, cream. Minimalist tech-academic theme, no gradients, soft shadows, balanced composition.

notes_for_dev: Start with desktop design, then adapt to mobile using the mobile_structure guidelines
All illustrations should be SVG or high-quality PNG with transparent backgrounds
Use CSS Grid for desktop layouts, switch to flexbox column stacks on mobile
Consider using Framer Motion or CSS transitions for subtle scroll animations
Lazy load illustrations below the fold for performance
The PublicLayout component should include a professional header with TutorUP logo (purple) and navigation links
Add a footer with: About, How it Works, Professors, Contact, Terms, Privacy Policy
Ensure all CTAs use consistent purple-600 background with white text for brand recognition
The 'professoral vibe' comes from: purple academic color, clean typography, structured layouts, and educational illustration themes
Mobile sticky CTA should only appear after hero scroll and hide when user scrolls to bottom final CTA
Consider adding subtle geometric patterns in background sections (optional decorative elements in cream/light purple)
performance_considerations: Optimize all illustration assets (use SVGO for SVGs)
Implement responsive images with srcset for different screen sizes
Lazy load sections below the fold
Minimize layout shift by reserving space for images
Use CSS containment for independent sections
Total page weight target: <500KB on initial load
